plot: Ernest Hemingway's existential story concerns three men and their relentless pursuit for a 'light' to make it through the emptiness of night.
title: A Clean, Well-Lighted Place
plot_es: Ernest Hemingway's existential story concerns three men and their relentless pursuit for a 'light' to make it through the emptiness of night.
plot_en: Ernest Hemingway's existential story concerns three men and their relentless pursuit for a 'light' to make it through the emptiness of night.
